data.name: Horny Witch Hunt
data.detailed_description:
Once in a generation a mage is born who is so powerful they can't be beaten by ordinary force, they are called nymphomages, and they get their force by sucking the life out of other people through sexual acts. You are the only last living nymphomage, and the whole world is against you.

Explore the world where everyone is afraid of your immense power. Some will run, some will fight, and some will try to bribe their way into your favour. They're all at your mercy.

What they don't know is you need their cooperation. The only way to maintain your power is to engage in sexual intercourse. The more perverse the act, the more power you gain. But beware, forcing your way does not work, as you need to absorb the energy of their dedication and lust towards you.

Features:

- Branching storyline with multiple endings.
- Explicit sex scenes with many options.
- Have more sex than anyone could possibly imagine. Your lust and body have no limits.

Some humans you encounter will be more clever than others. Some might even become your friends, at least temporarily.

Gameplay:

You will be presented with a series of choices throughout the game. Some of these choices will affect the direction of the story, while others will affect the sex scenes you see.

data.short_description: Once in a generation a mage is born who is so powerful they can't be beaten by ordinary force, they are called nymphomages, and they get their force by sucking the life out of other people through sexual acts. You are the only last living nymphomage, and the whole world is against you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Contains images of sexually explicit content and nudity. Some scenes contain violence, blood, and a modest amount of gore.
